title: Pixel 3 xl losing charge while turned off
content: So for the last 2 days I have turned my phone off while at work.  At the end of my shift when I try to turn my phone on it won't power up.  I have to plug it into a charger to power on and it's at 1%.  Both days it was turned off with 80+% battery life left.  Also when I try to turn it on I have to hold the power button for 30 sec.  Additionally I've noticed the power has been draining excessively with power save turned on and adaptive power turned on.  Any thoughts?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
